text: Buly Arena is an ice hockey arena in Kravaře in the Czech Republic. The stadium was opened in the year 2003. It has a capacity around 1,000 seats and was built for the training of teams, including the Czech national ice hockey team. Buly Arena is also a sport and relaxation center. It offers a tennis hall, outdoor tennis courts and football pitch.
